caption.p: Correlogram (Spearman's correlation) between the attributes measured based on the local perception of the residents of the rural settlement Dom Helder Câmara, in the municipality of Murici, state of Alagoas, northeastern Brazil. Cons consumption intensity, Com commercial potential, Tas Taste, Pro propagation potential, Nut nutritional potential, SA spatial availability of the part of the plant used as food, Col Ease of collection, TA temporal availability of the part of the plant used as food, Med medicinal potential, Ef absence of adverse effects; *p < 0.05; **p < 0.01.
